thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: Bruce B

author: Bruce B
title: Bruce B
text:
Joey was professional, polite over the phone. He was very flexible as there was a missed communication on the first day but was willing to reschedule no problem first thing in the morning the next day.
He checked in/offered status updates throughout the process and offered recommendations as the status became clear. Also answered questions about how he would price fixing the clogged area drain not knowing the full extent of the clog...
At this time my only experience is with clogged drains so can't comment on other plumbing capabilities.
